alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:46PM MDT until June 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BENT COUNTY... At 645 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located about 10 miles north of Las Animas, or 19 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, John Martin Reservoir, Blue Lake and Fort Lyon. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
